periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Cloudy. High near 82, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. East wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

Mostly cloudy. High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. East wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.
